author: Predeactor
description: Cog for administrating a Red Discord Bot instance. Get your own instance at https://discord.red
install_msg:
Thank for installing my cogs.
Please not that this cog will remain unapproved by Cog Creators as long as I want to. I also do not provide support if I do not want to. It's all up to me.
short: Cog for administrating a Red Discord Bot instance.
